Fountain.effect: At the start of your turn gain 1 Mana for every 2 friendly Units in a 1 Tile AoE.

Market.effect: At the start of your turn gain 1 Gold for every 2 friendly Units in a 1 Tile AoE.

Territorial Flag.effect: You control the Tiles adjacent to this Building.

Archer Tower.effect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 Damage to an Enemy Unit adjacent to this Building.

Beacon of Light.effect: At the end of your turn, Heal 2 damage to all friendly units adjacent to this Building.

Fire Sorceress Tower.effect: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to an Enemy Unit in a 2 Tile Radius of this Building.

Arcane Library.effect: Spells cost 1 less Resource to cast.

Bank.effect: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Gold.

Energy Tower.effect: Units adjacent to this Building have +1 Power.

Null-Field Generator.effect: Anything within a 1 Tile AoE of this Building cannot affect anything else outside of this area with Elemental Domain Spells, and vice versa.

Hut.effect: This Building always counts as a Unit.

Village.effect: This Building always counts as 2 Units.

Barracks.effect: At the start of your Turn, summon one Minion in a 1 Tile AoE of this Building.
